releases.title: Download & Queue Visibility System
highlights: Added Download System Public or Private Types
Removed Global Hover Effects from Top Level Themes

releases.title: Admin/User Log System
highlights: Fixed Log types not being classified properly

releases.title: API Authentication Fixes
highlights: Fixed API authentication issues for Thumbnail Endpoint
Fixed API authentication issues for Downloads Endpoint

releases.title: Mobile UI & Login Improvements
highlights: Fixed HTTP Warning on Login Page

releases.title: System Management & Application Control WebUI
highlights: Added Full-Implementation of Admin Settings UI
Added Database Backup and Management Features
Fixed some Header Issues for better Client Resolution behind Proxies

releases.title: Admin Settings & User Management
highlights: Moved some User Settings into Admin Settings

releases.title: Root Route Fixes & UI Improvements
highlights: Fixed a Login Loop and Improved Login Flow
UI Cleanup and Login Screen Polishing
Fixed Error Handling for discovered Edge Cases

releases.title: Authentication & Security Overhaul
highlights: Added JWT-based Authentication with Key Rotation
Added User Management and Control System
Added Audit Logging for Authentication and System Events
Added Protection for Sensitive API Endpoints

releases.title: Version Tracking & Domain Fixes
highlights: Fixed Domain Parsing for sites with Multiple Domains

releases.title: Queue System & Browser Localization
highlights: Fixed Queue System for better concurrency

releases.title: Performance & Resource Optimization
highlights: Audited for Memory Leaks, Bad Process Handling. and Resource Consolidation
Added UUID-based File Handling for better Compatibility

releases.title: Cookie Support & Cache Management
highlights: Added support for Downloading with Cookies

releases.title: Initial Release
highlights: Added YT-DLP Integration for multi-platform support
